name: Shibboleth
description:
In this VR narrative adventure, players become stowaways onboard a cargo freighter , and discover a secret that they shouldn't have.

Developped on Oculus Rift, I haven't tested other headsets but it *should* work.

Grip to grab stuff, just push your hand onto buttons to press them.

This game was developped over four weeks during my masters course in Games Design and Development at the NFTS, with writing by Matthew Dickie, music by Mathilde Koechlin, and sound design by Diego Hernandez España Cadena.
